v8:item.v8:content: Documents of non-cash expenses from companies' banking accounts
Company for which the expenses from the account is produced
Document transaction type: to vendor, to customer, to advance holder, taxes or to expenses
Company bank account, for which the expense is issued
Depending on the operation kind, specify a customer or a vendor
Advance holder who receives the cash funds
Document overrun-filled-in in case of cash advance overrun by advance holder
The payment purpose text. Shown in the relative field of the document print form
Division where the payment has been appropriated to
Goods order according to which the payment is done
Type of VAT taxation for the sale of goods and services
Payment details of settlements with counterparties
Contract with Company, according to which the payment is being processed
Document, on the basis of which the payment is being processed
Amount of payment in the currency of settlements under the contract with counterparty
Currency exchange rate according to the contract with the company
Settlements currency multiplicity under the contract with counterparty
Amount of payment in account currency
Should be set in case of payment by the specific order
Should be set in case of payment by the specific banking account
Is specified in case of payment by the scheduled document
Payroll sheet, according to which cash funds are paid out
Amount of paid salary by the payroll, in the currency of the petty cash
Is specified in case of payment by the scheduled document
